thumb.title: HXD1Cが旅客列車を連結
thumb.description: 俺は少しな日本語ができます。しかし、英語と中国語ををもっと上手に話せるようになる。翻訳アプリをします。ENG: I went to China over the summer of 2024 to see family and be a tourist. It was a fun time, and I even got to ride high-speed rail. This video was taken in Xinjiang, where I just got off a Green long-distance sleeper passenger train after staying on it for one night. When I finally got back to America to read Wikipedia, it stated that the HXD1C is a freight locomotive. I guess you can call me lucky for catching this lol
